latin_letters_numbers_etc: Only Latin letters, numbers, dashes and underscores are allowed
noMoreThan30Char: must be no more than 30 characters
noMoreThan20Char: must be no more than 20 characters
email_val: The email must match the format
email_max: Enter an email address under 320 characters.
passwordValidMessage: Password should include one uppercase Latin letter, one lowercase Latin letter, one number and one special character
recaptcha_msg: Please verify that you are not a robot.
dateOfBirthMax: Date of birth cannot be greater than the current date
ageMin: A user under 13 cannot create a profile
firstAndLastNameVal: Only Latin and Cyrillic letters, spaces, apostrophes and dashes are allowed
